name: Post Extra – Gutenberg Blocks and Blog Plugin for WordPress
author: Anantsites

sections.description:
Post Estra is the ultimate Gutenberg block plugin for WordPress, designed to create stunning News, Magazine, and Blog websites with ease. Display your posts in dynamic layouts, including Post Grids, Post Lists, and Post Sliders. With advanced customization options and seamless integration, Post Estra empowers you to build visually captivating sites that stand out. Boost your website’s engagement and traffic with a plugin that’s fast, flexible, and optimized for performance. Perfect for bloggers, news publishers, and content creators looking to elevate their online presence—no coding required!

Credits

  • [Font-awesome](https://github.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome FontAwesome Free 5.13.0 Copyright 2012 Dave Gandy, Travis Chase, Rob Madole, Brian Talbot, Jory Raphael, Mike Wilkerson, Trevor Chase, Jason Lundien, Jason Otero, Edward Emanuel, Geremia Taglialatela

sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

What themes do Post Extra For Gutenberg support?

  • Post Extra for Gutenberg has no theme dependency. This Gutenberg blocks plugin is compatible with any updated WordPress theme.

Will Post Extra slow down my website speed?

  • No, Post Extra will not slow down your website. This Gutenberg blocks plugin brings you the outstanding facility of complete modular control over the activation of each individual block. We have also used optimized codes for this plugin which helps to load only the resources that are currently used.

Is Post Extra Responsive for Smaller Devices?

  • Also, the Gutenberg blocks available with Post Extra plugin are 100% responsive and have cross-browser compatibility. So it is responsive on smaller devices as well.

Is it working with old version of WordPress?

  • It works great with WordPress version 5 or more. And WordPress old version with Gutenberg plugin.

Does Post Extra Blocks has any plugin dependency?

  • You only need the Gutenberg block editor to use Post Extra Blocks plugin on your WordPress website. Then you can use Post Extra Blocks and create stunning pages.
